Target: OntoFHRS is an ontology developed for representing food hygiene ratings of business establishments.

Comment: An establishment dedicated to commercial activities, goods production, processing, storage, or offering services.
Label: Business Establishment

Comment: A business establishment where people can consume food and drinks.
Label: Restaurant

Comment: A business establishment where people can drink coffee, tea, and other beverages and eat light meals and snacks.
Label: Cafe

Comment: A business establishment that serves food and drinks in educational institutions, workplaces, or other organisations.
Label: Canteen

Comment: A business establishment that serves alcoholic drinks, especially beer, as well as other beverages, and often offers light meals.
Label: Pub

Comment: A business establishment that serves alcoholic drinks.
Label: Bar

Comment: A business establishment that sells groceries, food, dairy products and household items.
Label: Supermarket

Comment: A large-scale supermarket often located on the outskirts of a city, offering a vast array of goods including groceries, clothes, furniture, and household items.
Label: Hypermarket

Comment: A business establishment where farmers process, package and sell locally produced food or drink.
Label: Farmer Food Facility

Comment: A business establishment where growers sell locally produced food products or drink.
Label: Grower Food Facility

Comment: A business establishment that serves food and drinks from a vehicle that can move from one location to another.
Label: Mobile Caterer

Comment: A canteen that offers food and drinks to students and staff in a school.
Label: School Canteen

Comment: A canteen that offers food and drinks to students, faculty and staff on a college campus.
Label: College Canteen

Comment: A canteen located on a university campus that offers food and beverages to students, faculty, staff, and sometimes visitors.
Label: University Canteen

Comment: A business establishment within a hospital that serves food and beverages to patients, staff, and visitors.
Label: Hospital Premise Food Facility

Comment: A food facility within a childcare centre serving meals and snacks to children.
Label: Childcare Premise Food Facility

Comment: A food facility within a caring premise that provides meals and snacks tailored to the dietary needs of residents.
Label: Caring Premise Food Facility

Comment: A business establishment that remains open until late at night, offering food and drink alongside entertainment such as live music, dance performances, and dancing opportunities.
Label: Night Club

Comment: A business establishment that processes raw ingredients into consumable food products.
Label: Food Manufacturer

Comment: A business establishment that packages food products for shipment, distribution, delivery and consumption.
Label: Food Packer

Comment: A business establishment that sells food products directly to the public, end users or consumers.
Label: Food Retailer

Comment: A business establishment that distributes food products from manufacturers and producers to retailers, restaurants and other outlets.
Label: Food Distributor

Comment: A business establishment that transports food products from manufacturers and producers to retailers, restaurants and other outlets.
Label: Food Transporter

Comment: A business establishment that provides travellers lodging, meals and other services.
Label: Hotel

Comment: A small-scale lodging establishment, typically in a private home, that provides overnight stay and breakfast to travellers.
Label: Bed and Breakfast

Comment: A lodging establishment in a private house, usually smaller than a hotel, that offers travellers overnight stays and occasionally meals.
Label: Guest House

Comment: A food establishment that sells cooked food to be eaten elsewhere, away from its premises.
Label: Takeaway

Comment: A food establishment that generally sells a variety of sandwiches, often prepared on the premises.
Label: Sandwich Shop

Comment: A food establishment that generally serves food to be consumed on its premises.
Label: Catering Premise

Comment: A collection of information required to identify the exact place or location of a business establishment.
Label: Address

Comment: The level of standard maintained by a business establishment for food safety and preparation,  on a scale from 5, indicating very good, to 0 indicating urgent improvement required. The following document provides a detailed description of the Food Hygiene Rating Scheme: https://www.ncass.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Food-Hygiene-Rating-Scheme-Guide.pdf.
Label: Rating

Comment: An organisation that is officially responsible for overseeing all public services and amenities within a specific region, guided by the local government.
Label: Local Authority

Comment: A quantitative measure indicating the overall quality, including food safety and hygiene, structural adequacy, and food safety management procedure of a business establishment that serves or sells food and drinks.
Label: Score

Comment: A score indicating the food safety and hygiene of a business establishment that serves or sells food and drinks. The score can be 0, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25. The lower the score, the better. The following document provides a detailed description of the hygiene score: https://www.ncass.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Food-Hygiene-Rating-Scheme-Guide.pdf.
Label: Hygiene Score

Comment: A score indicating the level of structural adequacy required to operate safely and the design layout that prevents cross-contamination in a business establishment that serves or sells food and drinks. The score can be 0, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25. The lower the score, the better. The following document provides a detailed description of the structural score: https://www.ncass.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Food-Hygiene-Rating-Scheme-Guide.pdf.
Label: Structural Score

Comment: A score indicating the adequacy of implementing food safety management procedures, staff training, and awareness of potential hazards in a business establishment that serves or sells food and drinks. The score can be 0, 5, 10, 20 or 30. The lower the score, the better. The following document provides a detailed description of the confidence in management score: https://www.ncass.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Food-Hygiene-Rating-Scheme-Guide.pdf.
Label: Confidence In Management Score

Comment: A scheme to assess hygiene practices, food handling, structural conditions, and management procedures of business establishments serving or selling food and drinks.
Label: Rating Scheme

Comment: Tthe official date when the business began operations or was inaugurated.
Label: Business Establishment Start

Comment: The date of decommissioning or closure of a business establishment.
Label: Business Establishment End

Comment: The initial date when a rating became effective for a business establishment.
Label: Rating Start

Comment: The date on which a rating of a business establishment expired.
Label: Rating End

Comment: The object property referring to the address of a business establishment.
Label: has address

Comment: The object property referring to the rating of a business establishment.
Label: has rating

Comment: The object property referring to the local authority of a business establishment.
Label: has local authority

Comment: The object property referring to the hygiene score of a business establishment.
Label: has hygiene score

Comment: The object property referring to the structural score of a business establishment.
Label: has structural score

Comment: The object property referring to the confidence in management score of a business establishment.
Label: has confidence management score

Comment: The object property referring to the city provided in an address of a business establishment.
Label: has city

Comment: The object property referring to the region provided in an address of a business establishment.
Label: has region

Comment: The object property referring to the country provided in an address of a business establishment.
Label: has country

Comment: The object property referring to the rating scheme used to calculate the rating of a business establishment.
Label: has rating scheme

Comment: The object property representing the start date of a business establishment.
Label: is start of

Comment: The object property representing the end date of a business establishment.
Label: is end of

Domain: BusinessEstablishmentStart UNION BusinessEstablishmentEnd UNION RatingStart UNION RatingEnd
Comment: The object property relating the start or end of an entity or event to a specific period.
Label: in period
